name: Yallaiah Onteru
title: Senior Full Stack AI Engineer - Microsoft Azure Ecosystem
professional_summary: I am having 10 years of experience in full stack development with AI integration within enterprise Microsoft ecosystems, specializing in Azure OpenAI, Cognitive Services, and MCP frameworks for insurance, healthcare, and financial applications.

Using C# and TypeScript to address complex enterprise application challenges, I developed full stack solutions with Azure App Services and Functions that streamlined insurance claim processing workflows while ensuring regulatory compliance and data security across State Farm operations.

Leveraging Azure OpenAI and Cognitive Services to enhance healthcare applications at Johnson & Johnson, I integrated AI capabilities that improved patient data analysis while maintaining strict HIPAA compliance through Azure Key Vault and secure authentication protocols.

Implementing Python for AI integration and ML workflows, I built automated systems for banking compliance at Bank of America that reduced manual review processes while ensuring PCI compliance through Azure Functions and secure API development practices.

Applying Azure Cognitive Services to insurance domain challenges, I developed intelligent document processing solutions that automated policy validation and claims assessment while integrating with existing State Farm regulatory frameworks and business rules.

Utilizing Playwright for UI test automation, I created comprehensive testing suites for enterprise healthcare applications that ensured consistent user experience across platforms while validating HIPAA-compliant data handling procedures at Johnson & Johnson.

Employing JMeter for performance and load testing, I identified and resolved scalability bottlenecks in banking applications that improved system reliability during peak transaction periods while maintaining financial compliance standards.

Integrating REST API development with Azure Functions, I built microservices architectures for insurance applications that enabled seamless data exchange between legacy systems and modern AI capabilities while ensuring enterprise-grade security.

Applying MCP Framework within Microsoft ecosystem, I designed cloud-native applications for healthcare data processing that leveraged Azure Storage and Event Grid for real-time analytics while maintaining patient privacy and regulatory compliance.

Using Postman for comprehensive API testing, I validated enterprise-grade REST services for banking applications that ensured data integrity and security while facilitating integration with third-party financial systems and regulatory reporting.

Implementing Azure DevOps pipelines and repos, I established CI/CD automation for AI-enabled applications that streamlined deployment processes while maintaining quality standards across insurance, healthcare, and banking domains.

Leveraging containerization with Docker for AI workloads, I packaged machine learning models and microservices that improved deployment consistency and scalability across Azure environments while reducing infrastructure management overhead.

Applying RAG patterns using Azure Cognitive Search, I enhanced information retrieval capabilities for insurance documentation systems that improved agent efficiency while maintaining accurate compliance with evolving regulatory requirements.

Utilizing App Insights and Log Analytics for telemetry, I implemented comprehensive monitoring solutions for enterprise applications that provided real-time insights into system performance and user behavior across multiple business domains.

Integrating OAuth and Azure AD authentication, I secured enterprise applications across insurance, healthcare, and banking sectors that protected sensitive data while ensuring compliance with industry-specific regulatory requirements.

Applying prompt engineering techniques with Azure OpenAI, I optimized AI interactions for insurance customer service applications that improved response accuracy while maintaining brand consistency and regulatory compliance in communications.

Using Azure Event Grid for event-driven architectures, I built responsive systems for healthcare applications that processed real-time data updates while ensuring data consistency and compliance with medical data handling standards.

Implementing microservices architecture with Azure Kubernetes, I designed scalable solutions for banking applications that supported high-volume transaction processing while maintaining financial compliance and data security standards.
